name: Meteor Excavation
description:
This is a project we are currently working on. It's a game about digging as far down as possible. But how are you going to do that without a tool? Well it's in the name of the game but... You use meteors?!

Stroll from Left to right with... the left and right buttons.
Jump using Z and press it again while jumping to dive!
To get out of a dive, press Z again to do a roll jump.

Get as far down in all 3 modes: Normal, Chaos and mayhem
If you can even make it to 16 points in meyhem (At full 60 fps) you are a true god!

Current Dev High scores
Normal: 392 by Mptm
Chaos: 56 by Mptm
Mayhem: 8 by Mptm
